description:
Yuuhi and Samidare meet the Dog Knight, Shinonome Hangetsu and grow closer to him, but Yuuhi grows very wary after watching him easily defeat a golem by himself with his power.
Meanwhile, Samidare`s father returns as Hangetsu is making moves on Hisame. After interacting with several kinds of "adults", Yuuhi recalls his dead father—
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 朝日奈氷雨と東雲半月
